name: Tentickles
description:
Four little glowing squids fighting to death in a dark maze. Turn the lights on! A four-player game done for the 2014 Jam Mozilla Lumière by Jam Shaker.

In game : "LB" and "RB" to switch maze / press "A" when you're ready

If you do not have enough 360 controllers, press "Enter" to launch the game.

The jam subject was the light from a scientific point of view. We worked very closely with 2 students in optical physics. For questions, requests, the Mac version or just a hug, find us on twitter : @Shrimplick @Julgryphon

A game by Cécile Balsier, Tim Guthmann, Vincent Jalliffier-Merlon, Julien Fenoglio, Philémon Giraud and Antoine Villecroze
